question: How do I apply for PDEU admission?
answer: You can apply online through the official PDEU portal at https://pdeu.ac.in/admissions. Fill the application form and upload required documents.

question: What is the admission process for PDEU?
answer: Complete online application → Document verification → Entrance exam/JEE score → Merit list → Counseling → Fee payment → Admission confirmation

question: When does PDEU admission start?
answer: PDEU admissions typically start in April-May each year. Check the official website for exact dates.

question: What documents are required for admission?
answer: 10th & 12th mark sheets photocopies passport size photos JEE scorecard caste certificate (if applicable) income certificate (for scholarships)

question: Is there an entrance exam for PDEU?
answer: PDEU accepts JEE Main scores. They also conduct their own entrance exam PDET for some programs.

question: What is the eligibility criteria for B.Tech?
answer: Passed 12th with Physics Chemistry Mathematics minimum 50% marks valid JEE Main score or PDET score

question: Can I get admission without JEE?
answer: Yes through PDET (PDEU Entrance Test) or management quota with good 12th percentage.

question: What is the minimum percentage required?
answer: Minimum 50% in 12th standard with PCM for general category. Relaxation for reserved categories.

question: What is the fee structure for B.Tech?
answer: Tuition fee: ₹2
intent: 000 per semester. Total annual fee including hostel: approximately ₹5

question: Are there any scholarships available?
answer: Merit-based scholarships up to 100% fee waiver need-based scholarships sports scholarships minority scholarships

question: How much is the hostel fee?
answer: Hostel fee ranges from ₹80
column5: 000 per year depending on room type and facilities.

question: What is included in hostel facilities?
answer: AC/Non-AC rooms WiFi mess facility laundry 24x7 security medical facility recreational areas

question: Is hostel mandatory for first year?
answer: Hostel is not mandatory but highly recommended for outstation students for better campus experience.

question: How are the placements at PDEU?
answer: Excellent placement record with 85%+ placement rate. Average package: ₹6-8 LPA Highest: ₹50+ LPA

question: Which companies visit for placements?
answer: Top recruiters: TCS Infosys Wipro Reliance L&T Adani Microsoft Amazon Google Accenture

question: What is the average salary package?
answer: Average package ranges from ₹6-8 LPA. For CSE/IT: ₹8-12 LPA. For core branches: ₹5-7 LPA

question: How can I contact PDEU admissions?
answer: Email: admissions@pdeu.ac.in Phone: +91-79-23275060 Address: Raisan Gandhinagar Gujarat 382007

question: What courses are offered at PDEU?
answer: B.Tech: CSE IT ECE Mechanical Civil Chemical Petroleum. Other: MBA MCA M.Tech PhD programs

question: What is PDEU ranking?
answer: NAAC A++ accredited. Ranked among top 100 engineering colleges in India. QS ranking in 801-1000 band.

question: Is PDEU a good university?
answer: Yes PDEU is highly reputed with excellent faculty infrastructure industry connections and placement record.

question: What is the campus size?
answer: PDEU has a sprawling 315-acre green campus with state-of-the-art facilities and modern infrastructure.

question: Where is PDEU located?
answer: PDEU is located in Raisan village near Gandhinagar Gujarat about 23 km from Ahmedabad.

question: What is the student strength?
answer: PDEU has approximately 8000+ students across all programs with a healthy student-faculty ratio.

question: Are there sports facilities?
answer: Yes PDEU has excellent sports facilities including cricket ground basketball volleyball tennis badminton swimming pool gym.

question: What about library facilities?
answer: Central library with 1
intent: 000+ books digital resources 24x7 access e-journals and research databases.

question: Is there medical facility on campus?
answer: Yes 24x7 medical center with qualified doctors and ambulance facility available on campus.

question: What is the dress code?
answer: Smart casual dress code. No specific uniform but decent formal/semi-formal attire expected.

question: Are laptops mandatory?
answer: Yes personal laptop is mandatory for all engineering students. Minimum configuration requirements are specified.

question: What is the attendance requirement?
answer: Minimum 75% attendance is mandatory for appearing in semester exams as per university norms.

question: How many semesters in B.Tech?
answer: B.Tech is a 4-year program with 8 semesters. Each semester is approximately 6 months duration.

question: What is the grading system?
answer: PDEU follows 10-point CGPA system. Grade A+ = 10 A = 9 B+ = 8 and so on.

question: Are there internship opportunities?
answer: Yes mandatory internships in 6th/7th semester. Industry tie-ups provide excellent internship opportunities.

question: What about research opportunities?
answer: PDEU encourages research with well-equipped labs funded projects and opportunities to publish papers.

question: Is there a coding culture?
answer: Strong coding culture with programming clubs hackathons coding competitions and tech fests regularly organized.

question: What programming languages are taught?
answer: C C++ Java Python JavaScript HTML CSS SQL MATLAB and other domain-specific languages.

question: Are there technical clubs?
answer: Yes multiple technical clubs: Robotics AI/ML Cybersecurity Web Development Mobile App Development clubs active.

question: What cultural activities are available?
answer: Annual cultural fest Petrichor various cultural clubs dance music drama literary activities throughout the year.

question: Is ragging allowed?
answer: Absolutely no ragging. PDEU has strict anti-ragging policies and zero tolerance towards any form of ragging.

question: What about campus security?
answer: 24x7 security with CCTV surveillance trained guards and secure entry/exit points ensure campus safety.

question: Are girls safe on campus?
answer: Yes completely safe environment for girls with separate hostels security measures and women safety committee.

answer: Highly qualified faculty with PhD from IITs/NITs/foreign universities and significant industry experience.

answer: Excellent student-faculty ratio of approximately 15:1 ensuring personalized attention and quality education.

answer: Yes faculty are very approachable helpful and maintain good relationships with students for academic guidance.

answer: Regular guest lectures by industry experts alumni and renowned academicians to enhance learning experience.

answer: Yes PDEU has collaborations with foreign universities for student exchange programs and joint research.

answer: Yes opportunities for semester exchange programs with partner universities in USA Europe and other countries.

question: What is the hostel timing?
answer: Hostel gates close at 10 PM on weekdays and 11 PM on weekends. Late entry requires permission.

question: Can parents visit hostels?
answer: Yes parents can visit hostels during specified visiting hours with proper permission and registration.

answer: Hygienic mess facility with variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian food options and flexible meal plans.

answer: Yes single rooms available in premium hostels at higher cost. Most rooms are shared (2-3 students).

question: What is the room allotment process?
answer: Room allotment based on merit academic performance and availability. Preferences considered where possible.

question: Can I change my room?
answer: Room changes possible in subsequent semesters based on availability and valid reasons with proper approval.

answer: Strict discipline maintained in hostels with rules for timings visitors and conduct to ensure peaceful environment.

answer: Yes backup power supply ensures uninterrupted electricity in hostels during power cuts.

answer: Hostel fee refund as per university policy. Partial refund possible in case of early withdrawal with valid reasons.
